attributes.action: Declare a Bank Holiday on the day following our exit from the E.U.
attributes.background: Regardless of the media narrative and efforts of politicians and others to thwart it, we want our Brexit no later than 31st October  2019 and the day following to be declared a bank holiday on which the Britsh public can celebrate our independence.

rejection.details:
We think this petition is very similar:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/275481
